mapper.select: SELECT REV_NO,ITEM,IMG,WRITER,AGE,SKIN,GENDER,GOOD,BAD,TIP,POP,STAR,REVIEW.NALJA FROM REVIEW INNER JOIN MEMBERS ON REVIEW.WRITER=MEMBERS.NICK WHERE ITEM=#{item} AND OPEN=1 ORDER BY REV_NO LIMIT 10
